duties_responsibilities.duty: Ensure accurate and timely recording of hours for non-exempt employees.
Coordinate onboarding, plan, manage, and document training, training plans, work instructions, and SOPs.
Assist in the compliance with applicable HSEQ Performance Standards, and site security program.
Work with managers and subject matter experts to draft and update site-specific work instructions and SOPs.
Manage Safety Data Sheet database and hard copy distributions.
Collaborate with corporate training ATLAS, OTS and report to delinquent training assignments.
Plan, coordinate, and schedule training sessions and conferences with corporate or third-party presenters.
Manage compliant training content, schedule, and when called upon, present OSHA Instructor lead training, MSHA new miner and annual re-freshers.
Coordinate, schedule, and present when called upon, monthly safety meetings with managers and staff.
Take an active role in local recruiting and outreach effort, managing local job fairs and local effort for job posting.

education_certification.credential: Minimum high school diploma or equivalent.
3+ years administrative, human resources, or operations experience.
HR, Recruiting, or Payroll Experience is preferred but not required.
Experience with Paylocity or other payroll/time tracking software is preferred.
